reviews.text: This is a stunningly beautiful courtyard hotel and the owners did their utmost to make ones stay memorable.
reviews.title: Absolutely delightful

reviews.text: However Lijiang was wet and cold over the four to five days of our stay so maybe we were unprepared and had to shelter for a lot of the time under the covers of the lovely giant bed. Sophie who speaks excellent English was a great support and we really enjoyed it here but had one grump. The cleaning of the room was very cursory and toilets were left grubby and floors unwashed. Toilet paper at a minimum. The cleaners need a kick up the backside. Which is a real shame, as this was the one big negative. Snacks and drinks are available free all the time and their is a variety of stunning places to sit and enjoy the beautiful architecture.
reviews.title: Amazing place

reviews.text: We fell in love with Dadi the little dog who was everywhere and loved its tummy tickled.
reviews.title: Like living in the past but with a mix of the modern!

reviews.text: Lijiang is absolutely stunning and frankly you would not find anywhere nicer to stay.
reviews.title: Excellent Courtyard Hotel in Lijiang!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this accommodation in Lijiang for 4 nights snd totally loved it! The location is central but quiet. The staff is unbelievably nice. The rooms have just been renovated and the bed was wonderful to sleep in: just the right sofntess and comfort. The bedsheet were clean and dreamy. The decoration is classical Chinese with a modern quality. We had a 3-person room which was very spacious and so beautiful. I would certainly choose to stay here again.
reviews.title: highly recommended!!!
